website_summaries.verdict: Bounty is known for producing strong and absorbent paper towels, and users love the ability to tear off smaller sheets with these rolls.
pros: It’s nice to have the option to tear away a smaller square of paper towel with these rolls, making this a convenient and environmentally friendly pick
Sheets are thick and strong as well as very absorbent
cons: Bounty recently made sheets .2” more narrow

customer_reviews.title: Beware! Poduct has been switched!
customer_reviews.text: Beware the “Quick Size” ARE NOT THE SAME AS THE “SELECT-A-SIZE”! I’ve ordered cartons of the Bounty Select-A-Size paper towels in the “Family 2 rolls/package” from Amazon for several months now and been very happy. When I placed my most recent order, there was a message on Amazon’s webpage that said “this item has been replaced with a newer model”. Unfortunately the “newer model” has 15 fewer sheets/roll and costs $1.02 more/carton. The only way to distinguish between the original Bounty rolls and the “newer model” Bounty rolls is that the original ones say “Select-A-Size” on the package and the “newer model” packages say “Quick Size”. This a very disappointing development from both Bounty and Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie F.

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware: Smaller than Huge rolls but cost the same
customer_reviews.text: The Grocery Store Shrink Ray strikes again. These "family" rolls were substituted in for the "Huge" rolls I had always been purchasing with my Bounty Dash button, and these rolls are about 10% smaller for the exact same price. The only saving grace? These are the same awesome quality Bounty paper towels that they're always been - just there's less of them. I will be retiring my Dash button and I will NOT be purchasing these again.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Burtcher

customer_reviews.title: Not the Normal 2=5 Select-a-Size
customer_reviews.text: These are NOT the select-a-size that I like and rebuy. Each sheet is smaller and there are fewer on the roll than the Select-a-size Bounty. Think that promoting these as a special for prime members is misleading. I will not buy these from Amazon in future but will return to Target or Walmart to buy them.
customer_reviews.author: No Name

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE! Item Switch
customer_reviews.text: I ordered Bounty Quick-Size Paper Towels 12 Family Rolls. As other reviewers have stated, I ordered a similar product before via Amazon. I was happy with the product that I received. This time I just received what I have pictured. 15 rolls of Regular Size Sheets. At this point I don't know whether I actually have more or less paper towels overall. I am not happy with the Regular Size Sheets. Interestingly product came from Sam's Club. Box was marked Sam's Club.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kaufhold

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive price changed in 24 hours
customer_reviews.text: Paper towels are good not as large as I thought they would be by the description and they also were $7 cheaper the day after I bought them that really made me mad probably will not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Bounty is skimping somewhere and quality is going downhill.
customer_reviews.text: I usually love this Bounty. But since they changed it to ‘quick size’ the quality has been lacking. I’ve had a hard time tearing sheets and this last set I got is noticeably less thick. I can squeeze the whole roll and it’s still smaller than the previous pack I bought. They say on the package the same amount of sheets. But something is really lacking. The thickness, absorbency and quality. Shame Bounty. I hope it goes back to better quality!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: These came in tissue boxes marked Kleenex. Clearly inferior for the purpose of paper towels.
customer_reviews.author: Lorii

customer_reviews.title: If you love Bounty - DO NOT ORDER THE QUICK ROLE
customer_reviews.text: I just opened a package, not knowing about the Select-A-Size to Quick Role switch - and I immediately thought it was knock-off Bounty product because as soon as I touched it didn't feel like the Bounty I've known forever. It's much cheaper quality. I hope we can still order Select -A-Size. This reminds me of Charmin's ginormous roll where they went down hill with quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: nbny

customer_reviews.title: Smells sour!
customer_reviews.text: As much as I love Bounty paper towels, I’m sick and tired of these at least every other order arriving smelling sour - I just opened this order and had to throw every.single.roll in the trash! When they’re not soured they’re great; but they’re too expensive to keep buying and then having to throw them out due to the sour smell. I keep paper products in a dry place, and live in the desert Southwest and don’t have moisture problems in my home.
customer_reviews.author: C. Parker

customer_reviews.title: 😊Its the REAL BOUNTY PAPER TOWELS 👏🏻😊
customer_reviews.text: (I’m a “Real person “😊. ..). (very honest.. just to let you know sometimes I worry about that myself ....$ GREAT NEWS.. this is so exciting to get the authentic REAL BOUNTY PAPER TOWELS ... Compare the two will I have left before “virus time“.,, same EMBOSSING.... I don’t know if it’s exactly sectioned size etc. but to me it’s regular bounty and that’s what I care about!! Little expensive but at least it came extremely quickly good delivery wrapped securely .... and hope everyone is doing well out there 🙏🏻😊
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Not a Best Buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: So finally found some paper towels during all the concern of our current pandemic. I must say that I am very disappointed by the amount of product received for the price. Figuratively the math breaks down correctly that 2 large roles are equivalent to 5 standard however it doesn’t at all appear that way in look, quantity, and longevity of the product. Very disappointed for what I received for the price
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Is it REAL Bounty?
customer_reviews.text: If you look closely at the image, REAL Bounty Select-a-Size is on the left. The Quick Size (fake?) Bounty is on the right. There's a difference in the pattern, the way the word Bounty is displayed - and certainly the quality. The Quick Size is MUCH cheaper and flimsy. The question is: is it REAL Bounty?
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: waste of towels and very big
customer_reviews.text: y these all the time and the shoddy perforations make their use a very big waste of money. this is the 12th roll of 12 in the first order and the start of the 1st of 2 cases just received that are ripping wrong. this is the 25th roll in the last 3 orders of two cases each order to do this-please replace or refund
customer_reviews.author: pam

customer_reviews.title: Getting mighty thin
customer_reviews.text: Thinner than the last time I purchaded this. Always been Bounty faithful but if all that is left out there is cheap crappy paper towels only an idiot would keep paying more for them. "Goodbye Bounty", gonna find cheaper, crappy paper towels
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: No Directions
customer_reviews.text: These towels of paper did not come with instructions. I attempted to use them to line a pan for baking and they did not work. The cake stuck to the towel and then got burnt. Someone told me they were for drying things, so I took a shower but had to use a whole roll to dry myself. Seems kinda wasteful. Kidding.... These are nice and thick paper towels and they work great. I have them on my subscribe and save.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: I was highly disappointed in these paper towels. They are rough as sandpaper and do not absorb well. I spilled a small glass of water and all these paper towels did was spread the water around on the table. They are so rough on your face if you use as a napkin with your meal. I’m kinda glad half the rolls came with a bluish sticky substance all over them...likely from how they were stored in the warehouse. I was refunded half my money for the damaged ones. This means I’ll get through them a little quicker and will not order again.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany S

customer_reviews.title: Not as good
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as they used to be. Not very absorbent and lots of dust on them.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Hohler

customer_reviews.title: Bounty is Great but These Smell Funny
customer_reviews.text: I have been a Bounty paper Towel user all my life -- since I was a young girl -- don't ever remember my Mom buying a different brand. I have occasionally tried another brand but nothing compares. The only reason I rated some categories less than 5 stars is this is the 2nd delivery in the last 14 months that have a strange smell. I cannot seem to identify the scent but it bugs me. Every roll of the 2-packs has that same smell....why? Either it was stored with something smelly or something spilled on them.
customer_reviews.author: Robin P., Yonkers, NY

customer_reviews.title: Love the product.  Hate the price gouging.
customer_reviews.text: I'd have preferred the larger rolls, but today we get what we get and we PAY THROUGH THE NOSE!
customer_reviews.author: FLASH

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as from a store
customer_reviews.text: These are more expensive than the comparable store ones, while being marginally smaller, though it's all Bounty. However, these sheets seem to tear much less effectively, making it harder to use the select-a-size and get the value out of it (when you want to just tear one sheet and it tears off a half of the next... If these were cheaper than buying in store, that'd be one thing, but worse for more money than the big box retailers usually have it for (especially the places that offer like, gift card if you buy 2 multipacks or sales), it's not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Beez

customer_reviews.title: This isn't the real Bounty.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very smaller version of Bounty, not even Bounty, a knock off and it's small, real small, like hand size, the colors are Bounty but it's not, made in China
customer_reviews.author: Dartagnun

customer_reviews.title: Very Defective Product
customer_reviews.text: The manufacturer forgot to perforate the rolls. There were no individual sheets. Just one continuous roll that you couldn't tear off individually. Also the paper was turning to paper dust and getting all over the place. The entire order was like this. I cancelled my automatic delivery every two months. Will not order from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: horrible do not waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Only 4" high..cant take off tears all to pieces.do not buy a waste of money. I did not read the description close enough. Can't even use will have to throw away. I thought regular size my bad. Just horrible. How can amazon even sell something so cheezy
customer_reviews.author: Rose M.

customer_reviews.title: Mashed box this time
customer_reviews.text: I get this regularly from Subscribe and save. 5 or more subscribe and save gives you 15% off. The 15% off $30 makes it about the same price Sam's club currently has it. It's covid time so paper products and cleaning products are harder to get. This was delivered in a sub-par box that was mashed so bad. I can't load a picture, but it's bad. The rolls were a bit banged up, but not so bad I want to go to the hassle of returning.
customer_reviews.author: Lew Who

customer_reviews.title: Bounty quick size paper towels
customer_reviews.text: I DID NOT INTEND FOR THIS PACKAGE TO BE AN AUTO SHIP. THAT WAS MY MISTAKE WHEN PLACING MY FIRST ORDER. I TRIED TO FIND IN MY ACCOUNT HOW TO CANCEL AUTO SHIP, BUT COULD NOT. YES, BOUNTY TISSUES ARE VERY GOOD. I WILL KEEP THIS ORDER BECAUSE THEY ARE THE BEST FOR ME.I WAS NOT FINANCIALLY READY FOR THIS ORDER. I don't need autoship. I KNOW THIS REVIEW WILL NOT BE POSTED, BUT THE TOWELS ARE GREAT!!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Lively

customer_reviews.title: The only paper towel that works!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Bounty for years! I have tried other brands occasionally when they were on sale, only to discover I was using twice as many to do the same thing as Bounty. After 1 few mistakes like that, I decided no more. I will stick with Bounty, even if another is a little cheaper. Bounty is very durable and absorbent. I can even rinse one and wring the water out and continue to use it! My kids use Bounty because the learned from their mom it lives up to the claims they make in commercials.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Leaves lint
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what they are doing over there but Bounty used to be great. Now they leave lint all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: DonSmirti

customer_reviews.title: Quality & ease of use
customer_reviews.text: This product was previously thicker. It now seems to be loosely wound on the roll which makes it difficult to control the number of sheets you tear off. The perforations also do not tear apart easily.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but good
customer_reviews.text: Not very worth the money all though their decent quality. Too expensive
customer_reviews.author: funnyman382927

customer_reviews.title: A bit expensive
customer_reviews.text: Very expensive vs Wally’s world. Won’t do that again. But it seemed urgent at the time. WIPED out my walker for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: #N

customer_reviews.title: Total Rip Off
customer_reviews.text: Outrageously over priced. "Paper Towel Math" initially made it sound like this was a decent price but really, it is 2x the amount you would spend in store for the same amount. You also can't return without an outrageous return shipping cost. Don't buy these. They're not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Caleh100

customer_reviews.title: It is the quicker picker-upper!
customer_reviews.text: It lives up to its title of the quicker picker-upper. It is great for cleaning up dirt, grease, and other stuff..
customer_reviews.author: John F. Weber

customer_reviews.title: These DID NOT feel like my normal Bounty paper towels!
customer_reviews.text: Every roll in the pack was loose and not firm at all. Definitely did not feel like the Bounty paper towels I normally get. I am worried now about quality consistency so I have cancelled this item from my subscribe and safe orders. I'll just get it at the store from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Tear off the roll at all!!
customer_reviews.text: When you tear the paper towel off the roll they tear in half. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Tammy B Ellison

customer_reviews.title: Perforation Quality - Not the same as in store product
customer_reviews.text: This is my first amazon review. I felt like I had to write something to save others their sanity. The bad perforations on the paper towels almost drove me insane. The normal Bounty paper towels from the supermarket tear beautifully and crisply. This is not he same product. Every single time you go to tear a sheet, you tear half of the next sheet with it. Or better yet, you only come away with half your originally sheet. I recommend you avoid this and instead buy them from your local supermarket.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Size was reduced
customer_reviews.text: Product size has been reduced they're not huge Normie they're called family now
customer_reviews.author: Jason E Burgher

customer_reviews.title: Not that Great.....
customer_reviews.text: These Bounty Paper Towels are not as thick and absorbent at the ones in the Big Box Stores, (Wallyworld). So, there is no cost savings here, going back to buying at Wallyworld.
customer_reviews.author: W.

customer_reviews.title: Not mega roll.
customer_reviews.text: These are not the mega roll that I’ve been receiving. I thought I had placed wrong order. Deceptive advertising. Will not order again even for the convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn S.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Bounty is my favorite brand of paper towels. To me they are simply the best and the thickest and the strongest that I have tried. These rolls are huge and they have the pic a size so you don’t have to use a big sheet if you don’t need one. I look for good deals and sometimes try other brands just to be disappointed. This box of towels will last me a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B. Gander

customer_reviews.title: always just right
customer_reviews.text: I have these paper towels in my Sub&Save account. It is always nice having a couple of extra rolls in the pantry, ready to go for cleaning, wiping spills, or w/e. Super absorbent, always arrives in perfect condition. FIVE STARS*****
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Defillippo

customer_reviews.title: Not Bounty - these are fakes
customer_reviews.text: These are not Bounty. They are imposters, who knew that was possible with paper towels. Not good quality, do not buy
customer_reviews.author: tawny girl

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in my last purchase ?
customer_reviews.text: I have been a loyal customer for a long time and my last two purchases have been very disappointing. When I tear a sheet off I get a half or third of a piece of towel. The only time this has happened was when I used a cheaper product not Bounty. I don’t know what to do have you done something different not the product I could count on.
customer_reviews.author: zoedamama

customer_reviews.title: Flexible one handed use for eating & cleaning in bed!
customer_reviews.text: Liked the strength of towels & the way the tearing perforations were easy to use with one-handed situations. I use in bed as I am seriously ill. Great for eating & cleaning!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Elizabeth Gibbons, PhD, on CTLTD from NSU

customer_reviews.title: Bounty towels are a quality product for picking up spills.
customer_reviews.text: Bounty towels are excellent for use in the kitchen! There is a small problem when pulling the first towel from the roll as there is too much glue holding the roll together as several sheets are stuck together when you try to pull one sheet from the roll and this wastes several sheets.
customer_reviews.author: william a johnson

customer_reviews.title: The best paper towels, huge rolls last forever
customer_reviews.text: Strong sheets. We love the extra large rolls because they last a very long time. Also getting the 12 count lasts for months! Good price point...these are all that I buy.
customer_reviews.author: Reverie Chappell

customer_reviews.title: BOUNTY SELECT-A-SIZE HAS BEEN OUR GO TO FOR YEARS
customer_reviews.text: Even on Amazon, you have got to shop around for Bounty paper towels to make sure you get exactly what you think you're getting - and especially so the price is optimal. We love the select-a-size. I hate change, so when the select-a-size first came out, I figured I'd switch paper towel brands. Nope! You'd be amazed at just how often half a paper towel will do.
customer_reviews.author: DisneyDenizen

customer_reviews.title: My favorite papertowel
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this brand of paper towel. Very absorbent, can tear half sheets so only use amount you need. This is a very durable paper towel for cleaning and many other uses.
customer_reviews.author: Jana J Rennick

customer_reviews.title: STAINED
customer_reviews.text: 3 out of the 6 packages had stains on them. The box was fine and the package was fine, this came from the factory. I had to throw half of the rolls away
customer_reviews.author: pw

customer_reviews.title: Poor storage got one item damaged.
customer_reviews.text: One toll of the paper towels arrived stained with a mystery substance. The shipping box was not wet, so it appears they were soiled prior to shipment.
customer_reviews.author: S. Fields

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Highly absorbent. Comes with thick rolls so you're not always replacing an empty roll. Pricey but great product. We like optional towel size.
customer_reviews.author: Geri

customer_reviews.title: Good paper towels!
customer_reviews.text: In my shopping process, I failed to notice that these are the half-size sheets. Normally I don't buy those because they are usually more expensive, but I have enjoyed using these. I find that a half-sheet is usually enough. They are tough and absorbent.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Carter

customer_reviews.title: Bounty is the best
customer_reviews.text: Buy them once a month - perfect with the quick size.Bounty is the best. Don't waste your money on the cheaper ones.
customer_reviews.author: Anne J

customer_reviews.title: Absorbent
customer_reviews.text: These are the best papertowels. They soak up a lot more then you would think
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Anne

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: What a great value for your money. Plus it is easier than dragging them in from the store. Now I don't have to worry for months about ordering again. I saved money and time. Being in a wheelchair even makes it that much easier also to have them delivered to my door.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: convient shopping
customer_reviews.text: I saw these and thought how nice to have them delivered to the door, I am a fan of bounty paper towels use them over and over, I love the way they last and can us for wipe hands then use the same towel to wipe up counter, Im vcery happy with them and the delivery
customer_reviews.author: julier

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time, in great shape. use to quickly clean up spills and use as a disposable washcloth which saves on laundry and disposed of when finished. No more, dirty, grungy washcloths sitting around
customer_reviews.author: Homeboy43

customer_reviews.title: Bounty towels are just Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: And it is great to be able to buy them "in bulk" and save money! I use them all around the house and yard - well, just about everywhere a quick wipe or mop-up is called for! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia P. West

customer_reviews.title: Bounty Quick-Size is the perfect size
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing better than Bounty in my opinion. And these quick-size have really been the perfect size, where as the a full size towel is often too big and wasteful. Amazon subscribe & save is cheaper and quick UPS delivery on Bounty!
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Some pretty thick rolls
customer_reviews.text: These rolls are very thick and super durable, I love how easy they are to use and pull apart.
customer_reviews.author: GOHARD

customer_reviews.title: Paper towels wet inside package
customer_reviews.text: 2/3 of the paper towels arrived wet - the box it was shipped in was dry, the outside of the plastic wrap was dry, it the towels are wet. Didn’t open until past the return window.
customer_reviews.author: Jrothbardt

customer_reviews.title: T Was Taken For A Ride
customer_reviews.text: Defective Inner Tube. These Are The Kind Of Products You Buy At A 99Cent Store. Rejects. Was Taken Advantage Of.
customer_reviews.author: RAMON FERNANDEZ

customer_reviews.title: So convenient!
customer_reviews.text: Love being able to just have these paper towels on subscribe and save. No need to hunt down paper towels in the store. Good quality. Very happy! The box lasts us the month.
customer_reviews.author: M.R.

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be boxed
customer_reviews.text: Would prefer that the large pack be in a box!! Plastic gets dirty when thrown around this is the second time this has happened!! Really makes me mad!! Very unsatusfied
customer_reviews.author: nurse58

customer_reviews.title: Bounty is always great.  Not when it's wet.
customer_reviews.text: The box was in wet tatters. The carton said Bounty. The thunder heads flitted around all afternoon as well as rumbled. A plastic bag would have been nice. Shortly after delivery it rained heavily for 3 to 4 hours. My only beef is with the delivery. Did Amazon deliver this???
customer_reviews.author: MJDonnelly

customer_reviews.title: This is the best paper towel I have ever encountered.
customer_reviews.text: This brand is the best I have ever encountered. It doesn't rip when you are using it like other brands. It is also more absorbent. We use a lot of it and I appreciate being able to purchase it in large quantities.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: These last a while in the holder.
customer_reviews.text: I hate changing out the paper towel roll, mostly because I’m cheap and it seems like they go way too fast. But these last a lot longer. Love Select-a-size. I don’t think I could go back to full sized sheets or smaller rolls.
customer_reviews.author: llisamac

customer_reviews.title: Bounty are the best paper towels
customer_reviews.text: At a time when paper towels were hard to find, Amazon came through. Always buy Bounty because I like the select a size feature and they are the most absorbent.
customer_reviews.author: TexasAV8R

customer_reviews.title: Nothing beats the quality of Bounty!
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived today, shipped in manufactures box. No damage to box or the product itself inside. All seals were still intact and no rolls were bent or anything. Can’t beat the price, being that they are family rolls and not the cheaper double rolls you find in stores!
customer_reviews.author: Donald

customer_reviews.title: Bounty paper towels is indeed the “quicker picker upper”
customer_reviews.text: We like Bounty because these paper towels are not only very absorbent but durable type. One can squeeze them out and continue to clean up the spill with the same sheet or sheets. We also enjoy the “pick-a-size”.
customer_reviews.author: JKessin

customer_reviews.title: Large
customer_reviews.text: These are good but the rolls are huge so they don’t fit on my holder. Just something to consider.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Best paper towels; cost a bit more but you get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: Booklady

customer_reviews.title: 1 day shipping
customer_reviews.text: I'm amazed of how fast shipping was. I have prime membership and was not expecting for my paper towels to arrive this fast, only 1 day! Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: BaTo

customer_reviews.title: STRONG - Choose the Size you Use - LARGE ROLLS
customer_reviews.text: Love that these are the FAMILY SIZE rolls and that they are perforated at the halfway, so you can use how much you need and not use a whole size towel when you just need a small clean-up. This is the best price I have found for this quality product. Love to keep a big supply on hand. This setup is perfect for us.
customer_reviews.author: Small~Town~Girl

customer_reviews.title: Absorbent, perforated to use smaller size as well.
customer_reviews.text: I use these a lot with little ones around- great for clean up. I like that the sheets can be torn into smaller sheet if you don’t need a large one.
customer_reviews.author: Sher

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: The quick-size paper towels are slightly larger than the usual select-a-size ones we see in grocery store, but what difference does it make, right? And they are jumbo rolls too! With the $3 coupon I got, it’s a bargain!
customer_reviews.author: Joslin Chen

customer_reviews.title: Did you know..
customer_reviews.text: You can wash and hang dry bounty several times before it tears. Us koreans have been on that for years. To save green, trees and plants and stuff
customer_reviews.author: steven park

customer_reviews.title: THE QUICKER DOG PEE PICKER UPPER
customer_reviews.text: Have an accident? Oops! No problem. Mom is there with Bounty to quicky picker upper! 10/10 probably picks up more than dog pee but we wouldn’t know!
customer_reviews.author: Finnegan And Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Buy these instead of Kirkland Brand at Costco. Seem like it is a more durable paper towel, and other brands had a peculiar smell to them. I recommend Bounty Packs.
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: They absorb things
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what the big fuss is they seem to work like all the other paper towels I've ever used but everybody seems to say bounty bounty bounty
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Bounty paper towels Amazon subscription only way to go!
customer_reviews.text: I have paper towels for days I done the same thing with my paper towels as I did with my Tide laundry soap a delivered monthly I totally thought we would go through it but no the rolls of paper towels are ginormous definitely worth the money subscribe people
customer_reviews.author: CRYSTAL G

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased, good value
customer_reviews.text: Tears easily, absorbs well, many sheets to a roll, delivery was on time with no damage to packaging. Wife was very happy, which made me happy.
customer_reviews.author: Roger K

customer_reviews.title: Best cloth ever
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to use. Very easy to wipe things up. Great for cleaning things up from my parrot’s cage.
customer_reviews.author: P. C.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely buy it
customer_reviews.text: To be able to get this during a pandemic Is in itself amazing especially a great product such as this with the pick a size option
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bounty is the best paper towel!
customer_reviews.text: Bounty paper towel is strong and I use it for many different purposes. Arts and crafts: make dolls and their clothes, make all types of holiday decorations, etc. To use as a facecloth in a pinch; just to name a few.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Murray

customer_reviews.title: Select a size is a good choice
customer_reviews.text: We have these set up for monthly shipping so we never run out. Plus the grocery cart and the car aren’t overcrowded by the size.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Courtright

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Always liked the options of a half sheet. Bounty does save your bacon and drain it too.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Anne

customer_reviews.title: Best paper towel ever
customer_reviews.text: As far as I am concerned, this is the best paper towel product out there. Love the half sheets that remain durable.
customer_reviews.author: Debi

customer_reviews.title: Good papper towels
customer_reviews.text: Bounty is a good paper towel. Surprised we could find any. Paid less for it than in the store. Fast delivery too.
customer_reviews.author: rnldlbl

customer_reviews.title: select size towels are better
customer_reviews.text: I like the select a size. sometimes you just need a small one, other times rip off 5. I have these on subscription and just get them off the porch. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Kent Knight

customer_reviews.title: Super absorbent but plain looking. Very pricey.
customer_reviews.text: I love these paper towels. Super absorbent. I wish they had pretty designs on them. The price is way too high.
customer_reviews.author: Amy L. Carmean

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, thin sheets that are less absorbent!
customer_reviews.text: These are not the same Bounty that I used to buy! The quality is definitely poor. The sheets are thin and not as absorbent!! Is this a counterfeit product?
customer_reviews.author: Maya S.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these!!! Highly recommend this product for the quality of the paper towel, can use in half size, super absorbent, and durable on tasks.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Haak

customer_reviews.title: EASY!
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can order bulky items like this and have it easily delivered. When you are loading up groceries at the store, big items like this take up space in your shopping cart and vehicle, and it is awesome to have one less thing removed from my shopping list. The price was decent too.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin D. Lyons

customer_reviews.title: different sizes
customer_reviews.text: Have tried several paper towels and decided to keep using these for price and good cleaning ability.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: The only truly absorbent paper towels. I will do without if I can’t get Bounty Quick size. Will be glad when they are available again.
customer_reviews.author: ajhornsby

customer_reviews.title: Household staple!
customer_reviews.text: Have these paper towels on auto ship. So convenient to know about the time I would need to go and buy, they show up at my door!!!
customer_reviews.author: ontheriver

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Average absorbency. I have to admit the half sheets drive me nuts... I don’t see the usefulness.
customer_reviews.author: joe10945-VA

customer_reviews.title: Best place to find them
customer_reviews.text: Instead of going to store hoping I will find. Order on Amazon. A little pricey but good value.
customer_reviews.author: FD

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!!️!!️!!️
customer_reviews.text: Thanks Amazon could not do any of this without you!!️!!️ Individually wrapped in two per package! Totally great value and always an amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: Joani, New York

customer_reviews.title: Last forever
customer_reviews.text: Love the amount and the price. Last so long, I must say I’m single but I do use so many as I’m a clean freak. I’m constantly washing hands or cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

product_meta.title: Bounty Quick-Size Paper Towels, White, 12 Family Rolls = 30 Regular Rolls
product_meta.description: Don't let spills and messes get in your way. Lock in confidence with Bounty, the Quicker Picker Upper. This pack contains Bounty Quick Size paper towels that have even shorter sheets for a versatile clean. Shorter sheets also allow you to choose how much you use! vs. Select-A-Size.
feature_bullets: This pack contains 60 more sheets per pack* which means 6 extra days worth of paper** *vs. Bounty Select-A-Size 12 Double Plus Rolls **Estimated based on manufacturer data. Actual usage may vary by household
2X More Absorbent* *Vs. the Custom-Size-It brand in the U.S
Running low? Just ask, “Alexa, order Bounty paper towels."
100% of the pulp used to make our paper towels is from responsibly managed forests
